You may also be looking for Second Age 1986.

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1986.

content.title: March
content.content: 25 - The Swiss Tolkien Society Eredain is founded.

content.title: July
content.content:
16 - Actor Calum Gittins is born.
? - Beyond Bree July 1986, including two pages from one of J.R.R. Tolkien's annotated copies of The Hobbit, is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
8-11 - Mythcon 17.
21 - The Shaping of Middle-earth is published in the UK.

content.title: October
content.content:
18 - Scholar Clyde S. Kilby dies.
27 - Artist Jemima Catlin is born.

content.title: November
content.content:
2 - Voice acting legend Paul Frees dies.
14 - The Shaping of Middle-earth is published in the US.

content.title: December
content.content: ? - Beyond Bree December 1986, including a quoted statement by J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.

? - Scholar S.R.T.O. d'Ardenne dies.
? - Lords of Middle-earth: Vol. I is published.
? - LÃ³rien and the Halls of the Elven Smiths is published
? - Phantom of the Northern Marches is published.
? - Trolls of the Misty Mountains is published.
? - The 1987 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar is released.
? - Beyond Bree 1987 Tolkien Calendar is released.
? - The Tolkien Calendar 1987 is released.
? - Mallorn 23 is published.
